modal.TITLE: Update quests

settings.HEADING: Settings
settings.HELP_MAX_LIMIT: The value must be less than 1,000,000,000,000,000.
settings.HELP_EARNING: The student earns the above stated amount when they answer single question.
settings.ONLY_OWNER: Only contract owner is allowed to perform this action
